price: 27 et redoutent le châtiment de leur Seigneur.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna hum min ʿadhābi rabbihim mush'fiqūna
